comments:
I have had to Force Quit Eclipse due to it hanging.  When I try to relaunch, I get a 
NoClassDefFoundError.
This time is is from org.eclipse.ui.workbench.  It appears that something gets hosed when
force quitting - although I have been able to quit Eclipse on Windows, and can restart without
losing anything (other than perhaps the last thing i was editing).  I have to totally reconstruct
a new .metadata, and recheck out all my projects, etc., copy over any changed files, and this
takes alot of time and is prone to errors.

(In reply to comment #2)
> Can you still reproduce?
> 
I am now using Eclipse 3.0.1 build 200409161125 and have not reproduced this error.  I have had 
Eclipse hang when trying a new plugin (due to bug 67384), but was able to remove the plugin and 
restart Eclipse with no errors.

KL
